description: This file defines an interface 'ILocalStore' for local storage operations in C++, including methods for opening, creating tables, setting limits, counting entries, retrieving entries, removing entries, and adding entries. It also includes a type alias for a shared pointer to the interface.

classes.name: ILocalStore
classes.description: An interface that defines methods for managing local storage, such as opening storage, creating tables, setting limits, counting, retrieving, removing, and adding entries.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the local storage at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in local storage.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit for entries in a table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Returns the count of entries in a specific table within a range.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves entries from a table starting at a given position.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from a table within a specified range.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to a specified table.
